00022 #include "dfsch/wrapper.h"
00023 
00024 #include <dfsch/strings.h>
00025 
00026 #include "util.h"
00027 
00028 typedef struct wrapper_type_t {
00029   dfsch_type_t type;
00030   dfsch_object_t* write;
00031   dfsch_object_t* equal_p;
00032   dfsch_object_t* apply;
00033   dfsch_object_t* hash;
00034 } wrapper_type_t;
00035 
00036 typedef struct wrapper_t {
00037   dfsch_type_t* type;
00038   dfsch_object_t* object;
00039 } wrapper_t;
00040 
00041 static void wrapper_write(dfsch_object_t* obj, dfsch_writer_state_t* state){
00042   wrapper_type_t* type = (wrapper_type_t*) obj->type;
00043 
00044   return 
00045     dfsch_string_to_cstr(dfsch_apply(type->write,
00046                                      dfsch_list(2,
00047                                                 obj,
00048                                                 state)));
00049 }
00050 
00051 static int wrapper_equal_p(dfsch_object_t* a, dfsch_object_t* b){
00052   wrapper_type_t* type = (wrapper_type_t*) a->type;
00053 
00054   return (dfsch_apply(type->equal_p,
00055                       dfsch_list(2, a, b))) != NULL;
00056   
00057 }
00058 
00059 static dfsch_object_t* wrapper_apply(dfsch_object_t* obj, 
00060                                      dfsch_object_t* args,
00061                                      dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00062   wrapper_type_t* type = (wrapper_type_t*) obj->type;
00063 
00064   return dfsch_apply_tr(type->apply,
00065                         dfsch_list(2, obj, args),
00066                         esc);
00067 }
00068 static size_t wrapper_hash(dfsch_object_t* obj){
00069   wrapper_type_t* type = (wrapper_type_t*) obj->type;
00070 
00071   return 
00072     dfsch_make_number_from_long(dfsch_apply(type->hash,
00073                                             dfsch_list(1,
00074                                                        obj)));
00075 }
00076 
00077 static const dfsch_type_t wrapper_basetype = {
00078   DFSCH_ABSTRACT_TYPE,
00079   NULL,
00080   0,
00081   "wraped-object",
00082   NULL,
00083   NULL,
00084   NULL,
00085   NULL
00086 };
00087 
00088 
00089 static const dfsch_type_t wrapper_type = {
00090   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00091   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00092   sizeof(wrapper_type_t),
00093   "wrapper-type",
00094   NULL,
00095   NULL,
00096   NULL,
00097 };
00098 
00099 
00100 extern dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_wrapper_type(char* name,
00101                                                dfsch_object_t* write,
00102                                                dfsch_object_t* equal_p,
00103                                                dfsch_object_t* apply,
00104                                                dfsch_object_t* hash){
00105 
00106   wrapper_type_t* t = (wrapper_type_t*)
00107     dfsch_make_object((dfsch_type_t*)&wrapper_type);
00108   
00109   t->type.name = name;
00110   t->type.size = sizeof(wrapper_t);
00111   t->type.superclass = &wrapper_basetype;
00112   
00113   if (write){
00114     t->type.write = wrapper_write;
00115     t->write = write;
00116   }else{
00117     t->type.write = NULL;
00118   }
00119 
00120   if (equal_p){
00121     t->type.equal_p = wrapper_equal_p;
00122     t->equal_p = equal_p;
00123   }else{
00124     t->type.equal_p = NULL;
00125   }
00126 
00127   if (apply){
00128     t->type.apply = wrapper_apply;
00129     t->apply = apply;
00130   }else{
00131     t->type.apply = NULL;
00132   }
00133 
00134   if (hash){
00135     t->type.hash = wrapper_hash;
00136     t->hash = hash;
00137   }else{
00138     t->type.hash = NULL;
00139   }
00140   
00141   return (dfsch_object_t*)t;
00142 }
00143 
00144 extern dfsch_object_t* dfsch_wrap(dfsch_object_t* type,
00145                                   dfsch_object_t* object){
00146   wrapper_t* w;
00147   wrapper_type_t* t;
00148 
00149   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(type) != &wrapper_type)
00150     dfsch_error("exception:not-a-wrapper-type", type);
00151 
00152   t = (wrapper_type_t*)type;
00153 
00154   w = (wrapper_t*)dfsch_make_object((dfsch_type_t*)t);
00155   w->object = object;
00156   return (dfsch_object_t*)w;
00157 }
00158 
00159 extern dfsch_object_t* dfsch_unwrap(dfsch_object_t* type,
00160                                     dfsch_object_t* wrapper){
00161   wrapper_t* w;
00162   wrapper_type_t* t;
00163 
00164   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(type) != &wrapper_type)
00165     dfsch_error("exception:not-a-wrapper-type", type);
00166   t = (wrapper_type_t*)type;
00167 
00168   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(wrapper) != (dfsch_type_t*)t)
00169     dfsch_error("exception:type-mismatch", type);
00170   w = (wrapper_t*)wrapper;
00171 
00172   return w->object;
00173 }
00174 
00175 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(define_wrapper_type, NULL){
00176   dfsch_object_t* write = NULL;
00177   dfsch_object_t* equal_p = NULL;
00178   dfsch_object_t* apply = NULL;
00179   dfsch_object_t* hash = NULL;
00180   dfsch_object_t* name;
00181   dfsch_object_t* type;
00182   char* typename;
00183 
00184   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, name);
00185   args = dfsch_eval_list(args, env);
00186   DFSCH_KEYWORD_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00187   DFSCH_KEYWORD("write", write);
00188   DFSCH_KEYWORD("equal?", equal_p);
00189   DFSCH_KEYWORD("apply", apply);
00190   DFSCH_KEYWORD("hash", hash);
00191   DFSCH_KEYWORD_PARSER_END(args);
00192 
00193 
00194   type = dfsch_make_wrapper_type(dfsch_symbol_2_typename(name), 
00195                                  write, equal_p, apply, hash);
00196 
00197   dfsch_define(name, type, env);
00198   return type;
00199 }
00200 
00201 static dfsch_object_t* native_make_wrapper_type(void *baton, 
00202                                                 dfsch_object_t* args, 
00203                                                 dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00204   dfsch_object_t* write = NULL;
00205   dfsch_object_t* equal_p = NULL;
00206   dfsch_object_t* apply = NULL;
00207   dfsch_object_t* hash = NULL;
00208   char* name;
00209 
00210   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, name);
00211   DFSCH_KEYWORD_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00212   DFSCH_KEYWORD("write", write);
00213   DFSCH_KEYWORD("equal?", equal_p);
00214   DFSCH_KEYWORD("apply", apply);
00215   DFSCH_KEYWORD("hash", hash);
00216   DFSCH_KEYWORD_PARSER_END(args);
00217 
00218   return dfsch_make_wrapper_type(name, write, equal_p, apply, hash);
00219 }
00220 
00221 static dfsch_object_t* native_wrap(void *baton, 
00222                                    dfsch_object_t* args, 
00223                                    dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00224   dfsch_object_t* type;
00225   dfsch_object_t* object;
00226   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, type, NULL);
00227   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, object, NULL);
00228   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00229 
00230   return dfsch_wrap(type, object);
00231 }
00232 static dfsch_object_t* native_unwrap(void *baton, 
00233                                      dfsch_object_t* args, 
00234                                      dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00235   dfsch_object_t* type;
00236   dfsch_object_t* wrapper;
00237   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, type, NULL);
00238   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, wrapper, NULL);
00239   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00240 
00241   return dfsch_unwrap(type, wrapper);
00242 }
00243 
00244 void dfsch__wrapper_native_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){ 
00245   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<wrapper-type>", &wrapper_type);
00246 
00247   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "define-wrapper-type", 
00248                     DFSCH_FORM_REF(define_wrapper_type));
00249   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "make-wrapper-type", 
00250                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_make_wrapper_type, NULL));
00251   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "wrap", 
00252                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_wrap, NULL));
00253   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "unwrap", 
00254                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_unwrap, NULL));
00255 }
